body_html: @gunan So what are the steps to include for example "tensorflow/cc/ops/array_ops.h" to the result build? Do I need firstly build with Bazel and then with makefile or do I need to add functions I want to use to makefile/tf_*_files.sh and then just build with makefile? I'm trying to build for iOS using build_all_ios.sh so could you please describe the steps? I would like to use examples from https://www.tensorflow.org/api_guides/cc/guide but I need use Bazel functionality. It is good to reduce the lib size to exclude some functions but how could I run different small examples on iOS?
